text: In this lesson, students will be introduced to emerging robotics technology that helps people with neurological conditions or missing limbs.
The goal of this lesson is to introduce the anchoring phenomenon of the unit and elicit student questions about bionic arms.
Listening to group conversations; reflecting on studentsâ€™ questions; Learning Journals (found in student-facing CLUE tab for lesson 1.1).
Whiteboards and markers or chart paper (for each group of students)
